name: Hallax
overview: Hallax is a Breakout/Arkanoid clone with power ups for 1-2 players (not simultaneously) It was developed by Relxax Designs and released by Binary Zone under their public domain label. It was also released commercially in the following... • Zzap!64 Megatape #37 (11/1992) • Commodore Format 1993/08 (Issue #35 As well as in the public domain again in: • Commodore Free #078
